mapper.select: select cmpy_seq, cmpy_name from CMPY_TB where CMPY_CODE = '0000' and STATE != 'D';
select cmpy_seq, cmpy_name from CMPY_TB where CMPY_CODE = '1000' and STATE != 'D';
select CMPY_SEQ, CMPY_NAME, BSNS_RGNMB, CRPRT_RGNMB, RPRSN, REGEXP_REPLACE(CMPY_PHONE, '(02|.{3})(.+)(.{4})', '\\1-\\2-\\3') cmpyPhone from CMPY_TB where cmpy_seq = #{cmpySeq} and STATE != 'D';
select CMPY_MNG_SEQ, CMPY_SEQ, NAME, REGEXP_REPLACE(PHONE, '(02|.{3})(.+)(.{4})', '\\1-\\2-\\3') PHONE, EMAIL from CMPY_MNG_TB where CMPY_SEQ = #{cmpySeq} and STATE != 'D';
SELECT type_cd, type_name FROM sberp.COMCODE_TB WHERE use_yn = 1 AND top_cd = #{code};
